about me

i believe there are 2 types of designers in this world — the ones who work as a designer and the ones who live as a designer.

i'm the latter!

FEATURED CLIENTELE:

  • Mento
  • The Climber
  • Unschool
  • Kingsmen Coffee
  • BeerTech
  • Boxx.ai
  • Finzy
  • Inner Goddess
  • Future Adults

If you were to visit me right now, you'll find me tinkering away with something — making things with pixels, putting pen to paper, trying to come up with a better mouse trap. I possess an undying passion for product, typography and graphic design.

I look at how design can solve any persisting problems of a business. Be it a simple brochure design or the redesign of an entire identity of a company, I focus on aligning the design linear to the business strategy and thus add value to the firm in addition to designing elegant digital products and graphics.

I'm always mindful of the micro-narrative and I constantly strive to take one step closer towards the big picture.

Above all, I listen with intention and I execute with sheer passion.

Based in Bangalore, IN.
Yet open to every work oppurtunity, freelance or collab.
Let's work together.
